All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AppInitializer
Servlet to initialize database connection once for the run of application.
DatabaseHandler
Class manages handling database.
DecodeServlet
Decoding servlet.
EncodeServlet
Encode servlete class.
History
Class responsible for displaying history.
JakartaEE10Resource
 
JakartaRestConfiguration
Configures Jakarta RESTful Web Services for the application.
KeyGenerationException
Custom exception class that is thrown when there is a problem with generating key for cypher.
LetterCase
Enum symbolizes original case of the word.
Model
The 'Model' class contains app logic of encoding, decoding and creating key for vignere cypher.
Operation
Operation class represents row inside database.
